scripts.stack:dev:up: pnpm check:AWS:ENV_EXISTS && pulumi stack select dev && pulumi up
scripts.stack:prod:up: pnpm check:AWS:ENV_EXISTS && pulumi stack select prod && pulumi up
scripts.check:AWS:ENV_EXISTS:AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: [ -z "$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID" ] && echo "AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset" && exit 1 || echo "AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID set with key ending in: ${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID:0-4}"
scripts.check:AWS:ENV_EXISTS:AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_K: [ -z "$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY" ] && echo "AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset" && exit 1 || echo "AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY set with key ending in: ${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY:0-4}"
scripts.check:AWS:ENV_EXISTS:AWS_REGION: [ -z "$AWS_REGION" ] && echo "AWS_REGION unset" && exit 1 || echo "AWS_REGION set to: ${AWS_REGION}"
